channel.title: Pillars on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in Pillars on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Legal Foundation
item.description: Template data license agreements and MOUs between international organizations saves time and resources.

item.title: Data Marketplace
item.description: A web-based proposal management portal facilitates seamless interactions between Data and Development Partners.

item.title: Shared Secure IT Architecture
item.description: Centralized IT architecture and processes for ingesting, storing, and pre-processing data, as well as for coding collaboration, lower costs and facilitate secure data use.

item.title: Data Goods
item.description: Accessible code repositories for derived data products and algorithms broaden Partnership impact.

item.title: Data Governance
item.description: A robust data governance system guides best practices for responsible and ethical data use.
